beans.description:
This adaptor does the following...
* reads data from stdin * invokes a webservice with the data
It is designed to illustrate the basic structure of an adaptor that processes data by calling a webservice.
Run it like this...
java org.openadaptor.spring.SpringAdaptor -config ws-xfire-writer.xml
You need the following in your classpath
lib lib/openadaptor.jar lib/openadaptor-spring.jar lib/openadaptor-depends.jar lib/opt/activation.jar
Once it is running you need to type some data into the command line, for the processing to succeed, the webservice it is connecting to needs to be running (see the ws-server.xml example).
